translations: [细胞] 分裂素；[细胞] 促细胞分裂剂；[细胞] 有丝分裂原

sentences.sentence: The extracellular signal-regulated kinase(ERK) is an important member of mitogen-activated protein kinase(MAPK) family.
sentences.translation: 细胞外信号调节激酶是丝裂原激活蛋白激酶家族的重要成员。

sentences.sentence: Mutations in GNA11 induced spontaneously metastasizing tumors in a mouse model and activated the mitogen-activated protein kinase pathway.
sentences.translation: 在小鼠模型中，GNA11突变诱导了自发转移性肿瘤，激活了丝裂原活化蛋白激酶途径。

sentences.sentence: To investigate the expression and activation of mitogen-activated protein kinases in non-small cell lung cancer and its clinical significance.
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨丝裂原活化蛋白激酶在非小细胞肺癌中的表达及其临床意义。
